title: What will the 5th generation iPod touch be like? - Quora

response.answer_text: 4" Retina Display: Like the iPhone 5, the new iPod touch has a taller 4" screen with the same Retina Display.New Colors: All but the black one have a white front, but they are now in colors.New 5 MP Camera: Like the camera on the iPhone 4 and The New iPad, the iPod touch (fifth generation) has a 5 megapixel rear camera.Dual-Core A5 Processor: The same processor as the iPhone 4s, iPad 2, and the third-generation Apple TV.iPod touch loop: A new button on the bottom rear of the back of the iPod touch pops out to connect an included wrist strap, and there will likely be uses from third-party devices as well in the future.Apple EarPods: Apple's new headphone, redesigned for better acoustics and sound quality for the same price as the old Earbuds. Included with the iPod touch.Siri: The new iPod touch has Siri built-in.iOS 6: The newest version of Apple's mobile OS, available to the public in mid-September.

Rumor has it that it will have a 3G or 4G cellular Internet option, so you can use it anywhere. Also, it will have the A5 processor, so it will probably support AirPlay mirroring and HDMI mirroring. It will be faster with more RAM and might have a better camera.
